articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Russian spacecraft comes alarmingly close to colliding with US satellite, NASA ‘very shocked’ | Mint - Mint
articles.description: An American satellite narrowly avoided a collision with a Russian satellite in space, raising concerns of potential danger to human lives. NASA's Deputy Administrator expressed deep concern over the incident in February 2024.
articles.content: An American satellite narrowly avoided destruction when it came within 10 meters of a Russian satellite in space.  According to a report by The Mirror US citing experts, a collision between the two c… [+2673 chars]
